concept.title: Large File Access
concept.shortdesc: This section discusses how to access large files using the 64-bit file server client API; how to intercept large file access from file server plugins and how to interface 3rd-party file systems with the file server to support large files.

conbody.p: Developers migrating a server implementation from the 32-bit RFile implementation to RFile64 or developing a new server should remember that the client may not be 64-bit aware. The client can still open a file using RFile and the server should handle the file accordingly.
